name: Black Rose
summary_text: A Russian Police Major is enlisted by the LAPD to help solve a series of gruesome murders perpetrated against young women by a sadistic sociopathic killer on the mean streets of Hollywood.

name: Gözetleme Kulesi
summary_text: A man and a woman seeking refuge from the world: Nihat at a remote forest fire tower, Seher in her room at a rural bus station. When their lives collide, each now has to fight their battle of conscience before the other.

name: Knockout
summary_text: A retired boxer tries to help a new student, Matthew Miller, who is being targeted by bullies. While learning to box and stand up to his tormentors the young boxer must learn to overcome his tumultuous past.

name: Perhaps Love
summary_text: A love triangle develops during the making of a musical in mainland China.

name: The Great Journey
summary_text: Reda, a young French-Moroccan guy and his old father drive from the south of France to Mecca in order for the father to do his pilgrimage. At first distant, they gradually learn to know each other.

name: Love the Hard Way
summary_text: The story of a petty thief who meets an innocent young woman and brings her into his world of crime while she teaches him the lessons of enjoying life and being loved.

name: The Great White Hope
summary_text: A black champion boxer and his white female companion struggle to survive while the white boxing establishment looks for ways to knock him down.

name: Daniel
summary_text: The story of Danish photographer Daniel Rye, who was captured by ISIS in Syria in 2013 and held hostage for 398 days.

name: Don't Tell a Soul
summary_text: Two thieving teenage brothers, stealing money to help their sick mom, match wits with a troubled security guard stuck at the bottom of a forgotten well.

name: Mayaanadhi
summary_text: The life of Mathan, a mule driver in a gang and Aparna an aspiring actress.

name: Ha phraeng
summary_text: Phobia 2 is composed of five short movie segments directed by five of the best directors of Thai horror films. A teenager who committed a crime goes to a sacred place for meditation and ...                See full summary »

name: Honeymoon Travels Pvt. Ltd.
summary_text: Six newly-married, diverse, honeymooning couples face marital bliss and discord, finding out more about themselves, their significant others and life in this happy-go-lucky, quirky drama.

name: L'enfer
summary_text: Three sisters share a connection to a violent incident from their childhood reunite to for the chance to come to terms with their past.

name: Taipei Story
summary_text: Lung is a former member of the national Little League team who lives with his old childhood sweetheart Ah-chin, a traditional family woman. Although they live together, Ah-chin is weary of Lung's past liaison with another girl.

name: The Swan
summary_text: When a crown prince visits, the princess's mother tries to push the prince into marrying her daughter by presenting a "rival" at the ball - her children's handsome tutor.

name: Psycho
summary_text: Based on the Buddhist tale of Angulimala, a dreaded serial killer, Psycho tells the story of a blind man who gets involved in a murder mystery.

name: A Novel Romance
summary_text: A best-selling romance novelist moves to Portland to cure his writer's block and unknowingly falls in love with his biggest critic. When their true identities are revealed, they have to find the courage and take a leap of faith.

name: R100
summary_text: A man in search of joy hires a bondage club to have dominatrices surprise him at random times.

name: Bolbol Hayran
summary_text: Bolbol, a rich man who is trying to take the hard decision of his future wife, meets the women who he believes is the perfect one for him but after a while he finds out she is not that good...                See full summary »

name: Comedy Central Roast of William Shatner
summary_text: It's William Shatner's turn to step in to the celebrity hot seat for the latest installment of The Comedy Central Roast. A parade of Shatner's friends have gotten together to boldly go ...                See full summary »

name: You Stupid Man
summary_text: After a man finally gets over his former girlfriend, who has moved to Los Angeles and become a television star, and falls in love with another woman, the former girlfriend's show is canceled and she wants him back.

name: The Blackout
summary_text: A debauched Hollywood movie actor tries to piece together one wild night in Miami years earlier which remains a drug-induced blur, and soon finds out that some questions about his past are best left unanswered.

name: Palookaville
summary_text: Jerry and his two pals, Russ and Syd, are just looking for some easy money to help them break out of their nowhere lives in their nowhere town. Despite a bungled jewelry store heist which ...                See full summary »

name: Stalin
summary_text: The life and career of the brutal Soviet dictator, Joseph Stalin.

name: Men Don't Leave
summary_text: A mother of two sons finds life considerably difficult on her own after the death of her beloved husband. Due to debt she must move them to Baltimore, and deal with the hardships and all ...                See full summary »

name: Hold-Up
summary_text: Dressed as a clown, the clever rascal Grimm holds up the most secure bank of Montreal and takes 30 hostages. While confusing and ridiculing the police with his strange behavior, he calmly ...                See full summary »

name: Judex
summary_text: Favraux, an unscrupulous banker, receives a threatening note, signed by "Judex", demanding that he pay back the people he has swindled. He refuses, and apparently dies after a midnight ...                See full summary »

name: Carry On Sergeant
summary_text: Sergeant Grimshaw wants to retire in the flush of success by winning the Star Squad prize with his very last platoon of newly called-up National Servicemen. But what a motley bunch they turn out to be.

name: The Amazing Dr. Clitterhouse
summary_text: A brilliant Park Avenue doctor becomes a criminal in order to do research into the criminal mind.

name: League of Gods
summary_text: Based on the 16th-century Chinese novel Feng Shen Yan Yi (The Investiture of the Gods), the story tells of how King Zhou of Shang becomes a tyrant due to the wiles of Daji, a vixen spirit who is disguised as one of his concubines.

name: Freelance: Ham puay... Ham phak... Ham rak mor
summary_text: A hard-worker freelancer who falls in love with a doctor. While his life is getting worse every second. He must find the way to release his life to the beyond of everything.

name: All My Life
summary_text: For Rami, all is for the best in this best of all possible worlds, as long as he keeps to himself. But when his longtime lover leaves him to marry a woman and his best friends drift away, ...                See full summary »

name: Salvar Davasi
summary_text: A group of women in a small village get organized against the macho men of the town.

name: Dreamland
summary_text: A young woman who lives in a desert trailer park must choose between caring for her hapless father and sick friend or fulfilling her own destiny.

name: Hollow Triumph
summary_text: Pursued by the big-time gambler he robbed, John Muller assumes a new identity - with unfortunate results.

name: S Novym godom, mamy!
summary_text: In New Year's eve, different stories interconnect, related to mother-son and mother-daughter relationships in modern Russia.

name: Inuyasha the Movie: Affections Touching Across Time
summary_text: Menomaru(a moth monster) was brought to life by a Shikon Shard. Inuyasha's father has defeated the monster's father 500 years ago. Inuyasha will need Kagome's feelings to win.

name: Dragon Ball: Curse of the Blood Rubies
summary_text: Goku and his friends must stop King Gurumes from destroying the city for blood rubies and gathering the seven Dragon Balls.

name: Oh Heavenly Dog
summary_text: A murdered detective must avenge his murder after he is reincarnated as a dog.

name: Dark Command
summary_text: In Kansas, during the Civil War opposing pro-Union and pro-Confederate camps clash and visiting Texan Bob Seton runs afoul of William Cantrell's Raiders.

name: Gold Diggers
summary_text: A pair of losers marry two elderly sisters, thinking they'll inherit their fortune and Beverly Hills estate.

name: Rats: Night of Terror
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic earth, where most of humanity lives underground, a group of surface people stumble upon an abandoned lab that was trying to bring life back to the earth's surface, but the place is run over by vicious rats.

name: The Marquise of O
summary_text: A German Marquise has to deal with a pregnancy she cannot explain and an infatuated Russian Count.

name: Repentance
summary_text: A successful author and spiritual advisor takes on a troubled man as a client, completely unaware that the man's fixation on his mother's death will soon put his life in jeopardy.

name: Roberrt
summary_text: Raghava lives in Lucknow with his son Arjun and is the head cook in a Brahmin's catering unit. He leads a peaceful existence, wanting the best for his son. All seems to go well, until some ...                See full summary »

name: Ciao
summary_text: Jeff is taking care of everything Mark left behind when he died in an accident. Mark was about to have a visitor, Andrea, an Italian guy he met online. Jeff and Andrea have the chance to share memories of the Mark they knew while getting to know each other.

name: Zusje
summary_text: Martijn is obsessed with his younger sister Daantje and visits her to make a documentary about her. He manages to invade Daantje's life with his video camera, but soon unresolved issues from a distant past come to the surface.

name: Sara
summary_text: Leon, the 40-year-old former soldier who is an alcoholic now, gets a job as a bodyguard. His duty is to take care of one of the Mafia leader's daughters. His problems begin when he falls in love with the 16-year-old girl.

name: Fingers
summary_text: A dysfunctional young man is pulled between loyalties to his Italian mob-connected loan shark father and his mentally disturbed Jewish concert pianist mother.

name: Go, Go, Second Time Virgin
summary_text: After being raped in an unknown rooftop, nineteen year-old girl Poppo meets a mysterious boy, and both share their sexual traumas and fears, with fatal consequences.

name: A Guy Named Joe
summary_text: A dead World War II bomber pilot named Pete Sandidge, becomes the guardian angel of another pilot, Ted Randall. He guides Ted through battle and helping him to romance his old girlfriend, despite her excessive devotion to Sandidge's memory.

name: Dean
summary_text: A comedy about loss, grief, and the redemptive power of love. Dean is a NY illustrator who falls hard for an LA woman while trying to prevent his father from selling the family home in the wake of his mother's death.

name: Magic Beyond Words: The J.K. Rowling Story
summary_text: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager to the loss of her mother and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.

name: Going Down in LA-LA Land
summary_text: A fresh face comes to Hollywood to act in movies but only the gay porn studios are eager to provide him with work.

name: Open House
summary_text: A couple on the verge of a nasty divorce attempt to sell their empty love nest and move on with their lives, separately. After a successful open house they are horrified to discover, days ...                See full summary »

name: Hellbent
summary_text: Halloween in West Hollywood, two guys making out in a park are interrupted by a serial killer. Later that night, a group of gay kids decide to visit to the site of the murders.

name: Call Me Claus
summary_text: Lucy's a producer on a home shopping channel. She hires the real Santa as Santa. He has to find his replacement as the real Santa in 4 weeks. Lucy is unknowingly the only candidate left.

name: Fakin' Da Funk
summary_text: A Chinese baby boy is adopted by a black couple in ATL. 17 years later he moves with his mom and bro to a black LA hood. A Chinese girl ends up in the same hood for the summer with a black family. Will they fit in?

name: Stella
summary_text: Chronicling a strong, but eccentric woman's devoted relationship to her daughter through the years.

name: Ram Lakhan
summary_text: Ram Lakhan is the story of two brothers who part ways due to their ideological differences, but how they come to each other's rescue as the story unfolds.

name: Blue World Order
summary_text: The film is set in a post-apocalyptic world in which civilisation has crumbled. A massive electromagnetic pulse has killed all children on the planet with the exception of Molly (Billie Rutherford), the daughter of Jake Slater (Jake Ryan).

name: Bigger
summary_text: The inspirational tale of the grandfathers of fitness as we now know it, Joe and Ben Weider. Facing anti-Semitism and extreme poverty, the brothers beat all odds to build an empire and inspire future generations.

name: Roswell
summary_text: Beginning at a 30-year reunion for members of a military nuclear bomb unit, flashbacks are presented that follow the attempts of Major Jesse Marcel to discover the truth about strange ...                See full summary »

name: A Good Man in Africa
summary_text: In a West African nation, the womanizing British 1st Secretary of the High Commissioner deals with different issues.

name: The Story of Louis Pasteur
summary_text: The biography of the pioneering French microbiologist who helped revolutionize agriculture and medicine.

name: Detective Dee: The Four Heavenly Kings
summary_text: Detective Dee is forced to defend himself against the accusations of Empress Wu while investigating a crime spree.

name: Knafayim Shvurot
summary_text: Daphne and her four children try to cope with the abrupt death of husband/father. As the family seems to fall apart, a sudden incident gives them a chance to heal their 'broken wings'.

name: The Big Bird Cage
summary_text: Grier and Haig are thieving mercenaries who engineer a prison break from the outside.

name: Timmy Failure: Mistakes Were Made
summary_text: An 11-year-old boy who believes that he is the best detective in town runs the agency Total Failures with his best friend, an imaginary 1,500-pound polar bear.

name: Sprængfarlig bombe
summary_text: Tony (Ulrich Thomsen) is angry and wants his money back after watching world-famous director, Claus Volter's (Nikolaj Lie Kaas) new film. Tony just got out of prison for violent behavior.

name: Bewafaa
summary_text: Anjali sacrifices her love for Raja after her sister's death and marries her brother-in-law. Years later, she meets Raja and is torn between him and her loyalties.

name: Heerak Rajar Deshe
summary_text: The musical duo of Goopi and Bagha make a comeback when they are invited to play for a king.

name: Animal
summary_text: The funny misadventures of a dating duo of movie stunt professionals in France.

name: The Tender Trap
summary_text: Charlie Reader is a successful theater agent. He is also successful with young ladies. One day he is visited by his old friend Joe, married with three children. Joe falls in love with ...                See full summary »

name: Asura
summary_text: A shady cop finds himself in over his head when he gets caught between Internal Affairs and the city's corrupt mayor.

name: One-Eyed Monster
summary_text: A hostile alien wreaks havoc on the cast and crew of an adult movie.

name: Damn the Defiant!
summary_text: On the H.M.S. Defiant, during the French Revolutionary War, fair Captain Crawford is locked in a battle of wills against his cruel second-in-command Lieutenant Scott-Padget, whose heavy-handed command style pushes the crew to mutiny.

name: Abracadabra
summary_text: A housewife struggles with her husband after he is possessed by a ghost.

name: Gerontophilia
summary_text: A young man begins exploring his attraction to much much older men while working in a nursing home.

name: Wittgenstein
summary_text: A dramatization, in modern theatrical style, of the life and thought of the Viennese-born, Cambridge-educated philosopher Ludwig Wittgenstein (1889-1951), whose principal interest was the ...                See full summary »

name: Tomorrow Is Forever
summary_text: An American World War I soldier, whose disfigured face is reconstructed by Austrian plastic surgeons, returns home after twenty years, but no one recognizes him, his widow is married to another man, and his son is a grown young man.

name: Mahi va gorbeh
summary_text: A number of students have traveled to the Caspian region in order to participate in a kite-flying event during the winter solstice. Next to their camp is a small hut occupied by three cooks who work at a nearby restaurant.

name: Thoda Pyaar Thoda Magic
summary_text: An angel, a man and 4 orphans come together to bring you a story filled with fun, excitement, tears, love and magic.

name: Wszyscy jestesmy Chrystusami
summary_text: Son's painful memories of his father's lifelong alcohol addiction turn to be traumatic for both of them. These memories make them realise the booze inheritance in their family. Will they get out of this vicious circle?

name: Kruimeltje
summary_text: The journey of a homeless boy who tries to find his father, set in the 1920's in Holland.

name: The Saint of Fort Washington
summary_text: A homeless schizophrenic seeks the help of a streetwise combat veteran as they attempt to overcome cruel life on the streets.

name: Roujin Z
summary_text: A compassionate young nurse is determined to help an elderly invalid strapped to a revolutionary health care bed but there are unexpected consequences.

name: Spontaneous Combustion
summary_text: A young man finds out that his parents had been used in an atomic-weapons experiment shortly before he was born, and that the results have had some unexpected effects on him.

name: Att angöra en brygga
summary_text: A group of party goers have trouble getting their boat ashore on a small island. The inhabitants of the island try to help, often with the help of an old sailor, and the results are absurd and hilarious.
